titleStmt.title: The miseries of vvar. By a Lover of truth and peace: and by him dedicated to all that are such.
titleStmt.author: Norton, John, 1606-1663.
Calver, Edward, fl. 1649, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Calver in the Wrenn catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
